com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

Interface Recommendations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BVRecommendations

    public interface Recommendations
    Interface for Recommendations

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback
      Callback used to asynchronously receive the Bazaarvoice product recommendations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getRecommendedProducts(int limit, Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback) 
      void getRecommendedProductsWithCategoryId(int limit, java.lang.String categoryId, Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback) 
      void getRecommendedProductsWithProductId(int limit, java.lang.String productId, Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback) 

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendedProductsWithCategoryId

        void getRecommendedProductsWithCategoryId(int limit,
                                          java.lang.String categoryId,
                                          Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products default is 20 valid limits 1...50; will use default if out of range
        categoryId - used to filter recommended products within a category. Mutually exclusive with productId. if productId and categoryId are set, productId will be used
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors

      • getRecommendedProductsWithProductId

        void getRecommendedProductsWithProductId(int limit,
                                         java.lang.String productId,
                                         Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products default is 20 valid limits 1...50; will use default if out of range
        productId - used to filter recommended products to similar products
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors

      • getRecommendedProducts

        void getRecommendedProducts(int limit,
                            Recommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors
